Missoula.Southgate Mall (Missoula): Southgate Mall is a shopping mall located in Missoula, Montana. The shopping center originally opened in August 1978 with Hart-Albin, Hennessy's, Nordstrom Place Two and Sears as anchor stores. Today, the mall is anchored by Dillard's, Herberger's and J. C. Penney.
